resources.string: Please update the app to the latest version
%3$s requires the %1$s app installed on this phone. First, pair %2$s in the %1$s app. Choose this option if you want to use the %1$s app as well.

The %1$s app is not needed for %3$s to work. After pairing, you can uninstall %1$s app or unpair the smartwatch. To restore cooperation with %1$s, you will need to re-pair your %2$s in the %1$s application. If you use the unpair function, the data on the smartwatch will be deleted. Make sure the %2$s screen is turned on during pairing operations.
To prevent data loss and ensure accurate data, synchronization is disabled in cooperation mode. Syncing would erase smartwatch data and lead to inaccurate readings in both apps.
Your device is already paired. If you don\'t know the key, please unpair it.
Press the button on your %1$s to pair

- Unpair the watch in your phone\'s Bluetooth settings
- Turn Bluetooth off and then back on
- Force close the app or restart your phone
- Try pairing the watch again from the main screen
Turn on display when wrist is lifted
Do not disturb, while you have rest (12:00-14:00)

Choose which data to sync automatically in the background. If you do not need any of the data, turn it off for better performance. You can still sync manually on the home screen or in the appropriate menus (swipe down).
Enter these details to improve the accuracy of steps, distance and calorie calculation.
Low and full battery level notifications
Enable the application to restart automatically in the phone\'s Auto-start manager
Additional permission is required to schedule the task at an exact time.
Additional permission is required to display the notification
Please enable Bluetooth and keep the watch close to your phone
Discovering %1$s (this may take up to 1 minute)…
If %1$s was not found, turn on %1$s discoverable mode or pair via the phone Bluetooth settings
Enable notification access: Phone > Settings > Notification access
Enable notification access: Settings > Security > Notification access
Only 1 setting can be used in free mode
Up to %1$,d settings can be used in free mode
Up to %1$,d groups can be used in free mode
Only 1 app can be selected in free mode
Up to %1$,d applications can be selected in free mode
Only 1 text can be recorded in free mode
Only 1 alarm can be used in free mode
Up to %1$d alarms can be used
The specified pattern is similar to a sample of another function, record a different one
Up to %1$,d controls can be used in free mode
Use the %1$s music control/find my phone features
This feature is only available in Premium mode
Setting failed (connection lost), please try again
New message received. Check it on your phone.

Supported devices:

requires the installation of the official app on the same phone. First, you need to pair your watch within the app, then you can use this app.

If searching for is unsuccessful, then you can set the MAC address manually during the search.

Troubleshooting connection issues:
- Recent apps screen: lock the (swipe down on the app preview and select \'Lock\' or equivalent).
- Phone/battery optimization: set app to not optimized.
- Phone/apps: clear Bluetooth Share and other \'Bluetooth\' apps data.
- More information: https://dontkillmyapp.com

This product and its features are not designed for medical purposes, and are not intended to predict, diagnose, prevent, or cure any diseases. All data and measurements are for personal reference only and shall not be used as a basis for diagnosis and treatment.
Exclude notifications (do not show the application notifications)
Alert immediately when notification is received
Alert for persistent (ongoing) notifications (those that can\'t be dismissed)
Alert only when screen is off
Alert only if the notification title or content matches (case-insensitive)
Non-alphanumeric characters have special meaning, If you don\'t know how to use Regex, leave this unchecked.
Are you sure you want to discard the changes?

Notification content: In publishing and graphic design, lorem ipsum is a filler text or greeking commonly used to demonstrate the textual elements of a graphic document or visual presentation. \nReplacing meaningful content with placeholder text allows designers to design the form of the content before the content itself has been produced.
Do not forget to turn off incoming call alerts in the %1$s app
Only if you have an incoming call
Up to %1$d contacts can be used in free mode
Up to %1$d contacts can be used
Synchronize %1$s alarms (this will delete existing alarms and set new ones on your smartwatch)

When using cooperation mode, the settings of the official application and the application can overwrite and delete each other\'s settings.

The last action performed will be the valid one.
Only 1 reminder can be used in free mode
Bluetooth connection is required to show the reminder.
State of controllers in do not disturb mode
Turn off Bluetooth at the start of DnD mode, and turn it on again at the end
If you are using cooperation mode, in the official <device_type/> application the do not disturb (DnD) mode must be between 00:00 and 23:59 and its status should be off.

You can share the watch face you have created with others. Send the watch face and preview files by email, and include the following information: author name, watch face name (max. 30 characters), and language. Only high-quality watch faces will be published

Firmware %1$s is unknown or does not support watch face upload. Please update the firmware using the official app. If the official app supports watch face uploading, please let us know via the Feedback menu.
Use in standalone mode, when using cooperation mode, the official application may block the watch face upload
You can\'t upload more watch faces today in free mode
Watch a video to continue uploading
Set a lower speed if the watch face upload process is interrupted
Invalid watch face file size, set lower watch face quality or remove items from watch face
The smartwatch battery is running low, please charge the watch
The file size can be reduced if the watch allows it
.tbwf watch face file language and country setting
Day of week names, month separator and decimal symbol
The smartwatch battery is running low
This watch does not support custom watch face upload
The custom watch face upload feature is currently under development and may become available in the future, but this is not yet confirmed.
Set these features if you are using standalone mode or not properly managed by Mi Fit
Use function as a touch in the control menu
Sound only if it is not muted or in DnD mode
Start music with the play button if no music player is recognized
Start music with the play button
Double press to answer the call
Press the button to answer the call
Only if the headset is connected
Restart if it is in progress
Only if the screen is not locked
You have to install Tasker first, after Mi Bandage
If it has a lower value, the music screen should be closed faster
If it has a lower value, press the button faster

Works properly in standalone mode. If you use cooperation mode, the official application will also handle these functions, so proper operation cannot be guaranteed.

Phones Bluetooth settings: disable input device

Recognised touches

music control


find my phone

Multiple touches can be recorded for each function.
Automatically update location in the background
This application collects location data to update the weather for the current location, even when the app is closed or not in use.
%1$s will have permission to collect location data even when the app is closed or not in use
Open Settings and select the option ”%1$s” for location permissions
Notification > Reminder alert function uses this timing
Display only alphanumeric and ASCII characters
Convert accented letters with non-accented versions
Replace the default line separator with other characters

• financial support for development

• no ads

• unlimited notification settings

• unlimited call settings

• unlimited daily watch face uploads

• unlimited number of alarms (limited by the watch)

• unlimited Do Not Disturb mode

• unlimited touch settings

• more frequent weather updates, automatic location updates, option to use AccuWeather

• detailed daily graphs

• unlock all other feature limits…
Terms and conditions of Premium mode

• I have tested the application and found it works as expected.

• I understand that I cannot request a refund or compensation for issues caused by changes in the system (such as Android version updates), hardware, or conflicts with other apps.

• All purchases are final and non-refundable (except as allowed by Google\'s refund policy).

• This app comes with no warranty, either express or implied.

• Use of this app is at your own risk. The developer is not responsible for any direct or indirect damage or data loss caused by its use.

• Premium mode is linked to your Google account and remains active after reinstalling the app.

The app must be restarted after purchase.
Google Play Services are not available
I agree to the terms and conditions.
Automatic e-mail processing, you may not get an response

• We only collect anonymous information.

• We collect information at the application level about the services that you use and how you use them (Google Analytics).

• We collect information at the application level like bugs, errors, and crashes to provide improvements (Firebase Crashlytics).

• We collect information at the application level about the performance (Firebase Performance Monitoring).

• Google Firebase Platform collects information anonymously. It reports trends without identifying individual users. The Firebase Platform collects data such as Firebase installation ID, application state, relevant device metadata (device model, CPU architecture, RAM and disk size, OS, screen orientation, country, locale/language), stack traces, performance metrics (including app start time and network request latency, network URLs), CPU/memory usage, Approximate IP address …

• We collect location data to update the weather based on your current location (optional).

• The legal basis for collecting and processing this data is our legitimate interest in improving the app\'s functionality and performance, as well as maintaining its stability and usability.
• Some third-party services like AdMob may use cookies or similar technologies to display personalized ads. You can manage ad personalization in your Google account settings.
• Collected data is retained by Google Firebase according to their policies and only for as long as necessary for the purpose of analytics, diagnostics, and performance improvements.

• We do not collect personally identifiable information about you. This means we do not collect personal data such as your name, address, phone number, email address, or MAC address.

• We do not collect personal health data, contacts, or the content of notifications displayed on your device.
• We do not share any data with companies or organizations, except Google and advertising providers.
Personal and sensitive user data we use
• We use location data only to update the weather information, and only if you enable this feature.

• The analytics, crash, and performance data collected are fully anonymous and cannot be used to identify any individual. As such, they do not constitute personal data under applicable data protection laws (e.g., GDPR), and are not subject to access, correction, or erasure rights.

• You can opt out of data collection by uninstalling the app or managing privacy settings in your Google account or device.

• For any questions about data usage or your privacy rights, please contact us using the app\'s support channels.
Privacy policy of third party service providers

Google Privacy Policy (includes Google Play Services)

AdMob data usage

Google Analytics data usage

Firebase Crashlytics Terms

Firebase Privacy and Security (includes Performance Monitoring)
Non-personalized ads that are less relevant
